WHERE PERFUME_BRAND LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, C.PERFUME_BRAND, C.PERFUME_NAME, C.P_FILERENAME FROM REVIEW_TBL A INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN PERFUME_TBL C ON A.PERFUME_NO = C.PERFUME_NO ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME, C.PERFUME_BRAND, C.PERFUME_NAME, C.P_FILERENAME FROM REVIEW_TBL A INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN PERFUME_TBL C ON A.PERFUME_NO = C.PERFUME_NO WHERE C.PERFUME_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_TBL JOIN MEMBER_TBL USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PERFUME_TBL USING(PERFUME_NO) WHERE PERFUME_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
